post.description: Logs in a user with their email and password.

requestBody.description: Logs in a user with their email and password.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/login" 
    -d "email"="xB8z9uz>-A'>" \
    -d "password"="6()YxO,;5,8y"

post.description: Registers a new user account and logs them in.

requestBody.description: Registers a new user account and logs them in.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/register" 
    -d "firstname"="!K*m-M{[\2en" \
    -d "lastname"="YLGFhy}0.2t]" \
    -d "username"="*OGi@qyD[pe~" \
    -d "email"="qxo3uKcx^8r." \
    -d "gender"="*69Eol|k)S_n" \
    -d "phone"="~5\M?:d7=nR0" \
    -d "password"="Z#T\NujpY<>]"

get.description: Checks if a username is available or already taken.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/user/check-username" 
    -d "username"="ZSS';>;K5HkW"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/contact"

post.operationId: Send a verification code for password reset.
post.description: Sends a verification code to the user's email address for password reset.

requestBody.description: Sends a verification code to the user's email address for password reset.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/send-forgot-password" 
    -d "email"="Od`_*:#EK8|A"

post.operationId: Check the verification code for password reset.
post.description: Checks the verification code sent to the user's email address for password reset.

requestBody.description: Checks the verification code sent to the user's email address for password reset.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/verify-password-code" 
    -d "code"="5" \
    -d "email"="G=+oI!=R1Z6,"

post.description: Changes the user's password after verification.

requestBody.description: Changes the user's password after verification.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/change-password" 
    -d "auth_token"="|OK8rZ@[Bx_u" \
    -d "new_password"="qDxv}o=tl!`\"

get.description: Retrieves the information of the authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/user/get"

get.description: Retrieves the events associated with the authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/user/get/events"

get.description: Retrieves the notifications of the authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/user/get/notifications"

post.description: Uploads and updates the profile image of the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Uploads and updates the profile image of the authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/edit/profile-image" 
    -d "file"="n0=*Y<YC`M=W"

post.description: Edits the information of the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Edits the information of the authenticated user.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/edit/profile" 
    -d "string"="kq3Gz$FIj{=<"

post.description: Changes the password of the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Changes the password of the authenticated user.

string.description: The confirmation of the new password (required)

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/edit/change-password" 
    -d "string"="xVpI[!cO{lx>"

post.operationId: Send a verification code via email.
post.description: Sends a verification code to the user's email address for email verification.

requestBody.description: Sends a verification code to the user's email address for email verification.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/send-email-ver" 
    -d "code"="12"

post.description: Verifies the email verification code sent to the user's email address.

requestBody.description: Verifies the email verification code sent to the user's email address.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/verify-code" 
    -d "code"="19"

get.description: Retrieves a list of featured events, sorted randomly.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/event/featured"

get.description: Retrieves a list of promoted events, sorted randomly.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/event/promoted"

get.description: Retrieves a list of recent events sorted by date.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/event/list"

get.description: Retrieves an event based on its unique ID.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/event/get/{event_id}"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/follow-user"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/user/unfollow-user"

post.description: Creates a new event with the provided data.

requestBody.description: Creates a new event with the provided data.

startDate.description: The start date of the event (format: Y-m-d).

endDate.description: The end date of the event (format: Y-m-d).

cover_image.description: The base64-encoded string of the event's cover image.

categories.description: The array of category IDs associated with the event.

extra_images.description: The array of base64-encoded strings of additional images for the event.

tags.description: The tags associated with the event.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/create" 
    -d "title"="%;"Bt!f9^/Zs" \
    -d "startDate"="l|:Ab'1|rIv&" \
    -d "endDate"="AcBcZ>hXUs'F" \
    -d "description"="w$8MpU]a+|qd" \
    -d "cover_image"="vk;]5x=VI2h." \
    -d "categories"="[]" \
    -d "type"="Gaw&yBR^C<D2" \
    -d "visibility"="/=idl4(SZ%A&" \
    -d "extra_images"="v@/ddz&=\.ii" \
    -d "tags"="%Vlak,"E]l<^"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/create/test"

post.description: Edits an existing event with the provided data.

requestBody.description: Edits an existing event with the provided data.

startDate.description: The start date of the event (format: Y-m-d).

endDate.description: The end date of the event (format: Y-m-d).

cover_image.description: The base64-encoded string of the event's cover image.

categories.description: The array of category IDs associated with the event.

extra_images.description: The array of base64-encoded strings of additional images for the event.

tags.description: The tags associated with the event.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/edit/{id}" 
    -d "title"=",dR<Gawwj4h#" \
    -d "startDate"="w;:TeKx}!6G:" \
    -d "endDate"=":]6VAfrfB(Pa" \
    -d "description"="#{>DLPb-#n5J" \
    -d "cover_image"="U=3T5q`G=aIx" \
    -d "type"="H[&n8!JXQ%"B" \
    -d "visibility"="nYSIJvh9KgcS" \
    -d "categories"="[]" \
    -d "extra_images"="wU=+14iJ+8eh" \
    -d "tags"="N)Ds"Cw<7@;k"

post.description: Adds a crew member to the specified event.

requestBody.description: Adds a crew member to the specified event.

username.description: The username of the crew member.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/crew/add" 
    -d "event_id"="1" \
    -d "username"="john_doe"

post.description: Removes a crew member from the specified event.

requestBody.description: Removes a crew member from the specified event.

crew_id.description: The ID of the crew member.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/crew/delete" 
    -d "crew_id"="1"

get.description: Searches for events based on the provided query.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/event/search"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/category/all"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/category/events/{slug}"

post.description: Retrieves an event based on its unique ID.

requestBody.description: Retrieves an event based on its unique ID.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/comments/get/{event_id}"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/comments/create"

post.description: Creates a new event ticket associated with the specified event.

requestBody.description: Creates a new event ticket associated with the specified event.

event_id.description: The ID of the associated event.

cover_image.description: The cover image for the ticket.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/tickets/create" 
    -d "event_id"="10" \
    -d "name"="%7hl>3ndL?-V" \
    -d "price"="6195.52675329" \
    -d "capacity"="12" \
    -d "cover_image"=")0cdL{"FHBSy" \
    -d "description"="v*m=s%nSHR,a"

post.description: Deletes the specified event ticket.

requestBody.description: Deletes the specified event ticket.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/tickets/delete/{id}"

post.description: Edits the details of the specified event ticket.

requestBody.description: Edits the details of the specified event ticket.

cover_image.description: The cover image for the ticket.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/tickets/edit/{id}" 
    -d "name"="*U+WBnot.X/;" \
    -d "price"="13324.8556031" \
    -d "capacity"="14" \
    -d "cover_image"="Zkn3Cs?d+`%M" \
    -d "description"="d*qY}lAt8/Se"

post.description: Generates a payment link for purchasing an event ticket.

requestBody.description: Generates a payment link for purchasing an event ticket.

event_ticket_id.description: The ID of the event ticket.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/tickets/purchase" 
    -d "event_ticket_id"="1"

post.description: Validates the provided event ticket code.

requestBody.description: Validates the provided event ticket code.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/tickets/validate"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/event/withdraw"

get.description: Validates the payment for a purchased event ticket.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/event/ticket/payment/paystack/{user_id}/{event_ticket_id}"
